title: Completed 6-Week Internship at TECHBROS
excerpt: Transformative journey into data engineering, business intelligence, and machine learning. Mastered ETL/ELT processes, PostgreSQL, Power BI dashboards, and built ML-powered platforms including Spotify music intelligence system with mood classification and recommendation engines.

title: Global AI Hub Python 202 Bootcamp Project Feedback
excerpt: Received feedback on ambitious CLI-to-fullstack evolution project. Started as simple book tracker, evolved through 3 stages: OOP foundation, Open Library API integration, and React app with interactive multi-floor library visualization. Learned valuable lessons about project scoping and real-world development challenges.

title: 2025 AI Hackathon Completion - First Hackathon Experience
excerpt: Completed my first hackathon organized by BTK Akademi, Google, and Türkiye Girişimcilik Vakfı. Eye-opening experience in time management and project scoping under pressure. Learned to focus on functional solutions rather than perfection, and gained valuable insights into competitive development.
